items.content_html: FastLoad.js is a lightweight JavaScript library for lazy loading images, videos, and other elements with Intersection Observer support. It is designed to improve page loading performance by loading content only when it becomes visible within the viewport. This library is available in two versions: CommonJS and ES module (ESM).
items.title: DxHikaru/FastLoad.js: FastLoad.js is a lightweight JavaScript library for lazy loading images, videos, and other elements with Intersection Observer support. It is designed to improve page loading performance by loading content only when it becomes visible within the viewport. This library is available in two versions: CommonJS and ES module (ESM).
